info.brief_description: Giant people with stinky feet rampaging cities and towns.
info.description:
This story should revolve primarily on some key themes:
- Mega giants (preferably women).
- Fictitious characters as well as celebrities are welcome.
- They have stinky feet as well as all have a fetish for stinky feet, on top of a standard foot fetish.
- They also have fetishes for their own feet and get turned on by worshipping and smelling their own feet.
- They get turned on by torturing and killing little people in cities and towns with their giant stinky feet.
- They like to fool around with each other. Please try and keep sex scenes somewhat vanilla and have them be primarily feet related. Breast play is fine.
- Incest is okay, but try and keep the fooling around to foot related.
- It doesn't matter if they are wearing clothes, as long as they are barefoot and stinky footed. Stinky sock and in-shoe torture is acceptable too.
- Please try and keep any characters engaging in sexual activity 16+.
- Vore is okay,

- No shrinking. Only mega. Keep their height between 50 and 1000 feet.
